text: Spooky tune for our ghost hunting hero. The heavy synth pitching up and down makes it especially memorable. Three more days until I can buy cheap candies (M&Ms and Reese por favor).

author: Rick - Witered

text: @Rick - Witered What's decent about braindead button mashing combat (with a lack of enemy variety or design), uninspired dull levels, sloppy visuals and unmemorable music? I guess I'll never understand it but maybe that's just "decent" to some I guess. There's a reason most people remember the first 2 and ignore 3.
